question: Param Padma, which was in the news recently,belongs to which of the following categories?
option1: A new Civilian Award instituted by the Government of India
option2: The name of a supercomputer developed by India
option3: The name given to a proposed network of canals linking northern and southern rivers of India
option4: A software programme to facilitate e-governance in Madhya Pradesh
answer: The name of a supercomputer developed by India
explanation: The Param Padma cluster was developed by the Pune-based C-DAC in 2002 following the ban by the West on supercomputer technology sale to India in the aftermath of the 1998 nuclear tests.
